subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Focusing on the Red Bulls’ high-profile international acquisitions ignores the near-flawless play of two rookies, Tim Ream and Tony Tchani, plucked from the American college system.
snippet: Focusing on the Red Bulls’ high-profile international acquisitions ignores the near-flawless play of two rookies, Tim Ream and Tony Tchani, plucked from the American college system.
